storyInfo:
Projekt Red's ferocity suppresses Crownslayer, and Kal'tsit's overwhelming power makes resistance seem futile.
However, after a conversation, Kal'tsit still offers her a second chance.

attributes.content: (*Pant, pant*...! *Pant, pant*...)
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (...A trap?! Was that attack back there just a feint?)
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (If she keeps cutting up my team, the whole unit will be worthless...)
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (I have to contact them right away!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (Grrr, why can't I move my fingers? Why am I shivering?!)
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (I... I can't let her get me!)
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Nggah!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (Low growling).
Projekt Red, don't kill her.
*Hack* *hack*...! Gah!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Is it her?
Yes, definitely. It's her scent.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: *Sniff sniff*
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Ick. Fake. She is no wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: But the scent is real.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The scent of a true wolf. The first true wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: True wolf?
You... filthy cub!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Mmf, how can I...? My muscles won't even respond.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Can... can you control me?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: She tried to use a wolf technique, a bite she learned from wolves.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: She wants to fight back. I can sever her spine, and paralyze her.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: No need for that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ok.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Wait, you...
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I know you... I finally found you...!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Traitor... you traitor! I found the traitor!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: And you are...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ilia's daughter, Lyudmila?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shut up! You have no right to speak my father's name!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Ursus destroyed all the lab, and all the scientists.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Is that what you think?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How dare you?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: It was you! You're the disgusting traitor who sold out my father with Sergei, who sold out all the scientists!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Your hair is the same color as his.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...What are you talking about? Why would you...?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Agh!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: You're wondering why I have no reaction to your accusations?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Because you're scum!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Scum. And what type of scum should I be?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Should I be a coward, out for wealth and luxury...? Or should I be cruel and calculating, doing whatever it takes to achieve my goals?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The me, standing here before you, does it fit your image?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I never thought... I never thought you were a heartless, cold-blooded woman!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Did Sergei give you a heartfelt confession before you killed him?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...What are you...?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Did you know he was Alex and Misha's father?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hah... Hahaha...! Alex helped me find him!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: ...Reunion took in Alex, killed his father, and hunted down his sister.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Projekt Red, let her move.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ok.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...What do you want?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: To give you a chance to kill me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A chance? Do you know what you're saying?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: You're giving up on life? You want to repent, like Sergei, who sat on top of Chernobog after selling out his colleagues?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: ...Oh you'll regret it. You'll regret everything you ever did!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: 'No regrets,' I always say...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But actually, there is one massive regret I will share with you today.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ——But I'm afraid it has nothing to do with your father.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll kill you. I'm going to kill you!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: *Hiss* Haah...
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: 'Swallow the bitterness of the dead'...
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Fog?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's Arts.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: No, not fog... This is smoke.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The nervous system stimulates a smoke-emitting organ in the oral cavity. It is indeed an Originium Art that relies on this Infected organ.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You stand there talking your mouth off... You're beyond saving. Are you so scared you can't even show it?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Why did you betray my father? Why did you betray the scientists?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Why?! Tell me why——
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: 'Director Kal'tsit'?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Lyudmila, I only barely made it out alive myself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You expect me to believe your bullshit?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Hah. Your father read you 'Truth and Justice,' didn't he?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To give a five-year-old a book like that... Ilia really had no sense.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But he loved that book. One summer day, he carried you, and the book, past the window, the bushes orange against the sun. He made you wave to me. You pouted and turned your head.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: That night, he asked me: what if we just sealed up the sarcophagus and never told the Ursus about the machines inside? Would we be able to save more people?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Would we be able to prevent the Ursus from using these machines in battle?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you saying all of this to... to confuse me?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Ilia was one of the scientists who came up with the plan to seal the sarcophagus. And his convictions influenced his entire life.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You have his fighting spirit. But there was more to him than that...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lyudmila, you call me a traitor, you want to kill me. You could do that, but——
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When you choose violence, you are doomed to one day meet something stronger than you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hah hah...
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Could you be more arrogant? No one, no caster can penetrate my fog. You have no idea where I am.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: You're going to die screaming. I need you to die screaming.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: ...... (Sticking out her tongue).
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: For the scientists, for the infected, I have to kill you. You Ursus puppet! You piece of trash!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Do I look like a caster to you? I am Infected though, you got that right...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Come, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Huh? What... what's that?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: H- how? Your spine?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I guess you can see through the fog, huh?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How...?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Ack...! Wh- what are you...?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: What is that?!!!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: I am not a caster. I've never relied on Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Go, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Happy hissing).
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Nnng... Gaaaagh!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: What is it?! What is that thing?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Aaaaaah! Don't touch me! Let me go! Let go of meeee!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Why can't I pierce its shell? Aiee! Don't touch me! Get away!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Annihilate...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Aaaaaahh!!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: ...the falling object above her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dissatisfied hissing).
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You're too excited. The building is going to collapse. Don't let her get crushed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mmmg......
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (Low humming).
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Just kill me.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...You can obviously kill me easily! Don't tell me you're the type who plays with your prey!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: If I can't kill you, what do I have to live for?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Just remember, even if I'm dead, I've still cursed you forever!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: ...Are you truly prepared to die?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you want to die?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If I am your traitor, will you feel better after killing me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...No more... talking! I'll kill you! I will!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: Ilia was my student, and my friend.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your father was one of my finest researchers. His dedication and selflessness could have pushed Ursus at least five years into the future.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't want to hear anymore! Why do you insist on telling me this stuff?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: You do want to hear it. Because you've always doubted yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You never let Sergei explain himself. So I'll do it for him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ——I don't betray people. Not even Sergei.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He was indecisive, but not greedy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Ursus authorities had his newborn son and daughter. He gave up your father's location to save their lives.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And now, Alex and Misha are dead. He wasn't able to save anyone, in the end.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If... If I had gone to save Misha, maybe she and Skullshatterer... would still be alive.
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: N- no! No way! Look how powerful you are! Why didn't you save my father?!
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: (Threatening growling).
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Because I couldn't.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I couldn't have convinced your father to leave the institute.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lyudmila, I sent you to Siracusa before I left Chernobog. And yet you went back.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, you're so like your father. Sometimes, willpower trumps time itself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You would always return to Chernobog, just like you would meet me here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So this is all meaningless? Everything my father did, everything I did... was for nothing?
attributes.name: Crownslayer

attributes.content: No. The researchers died to protect our secret.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ursus to this day has no way to analyze the contents of the sarcophagus. They've given up, and sealed off the installation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now, there's just a little energy left to harness, powering the core of Chernobog.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If I betrayed anyone, it's the Empire of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your father's efforts meant something. Even if Ursus has long since covered it all up, you can remember.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will remember.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Yawn).
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...But all that you did? What was that for?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ursus purged the entire institute and slaughtered every scrap of compassion in any of their scientists. The real traitor was the Empire itself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Look at you. You've killed Sergei, you've killed a man who couldn't protect his own children.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now you're in Lungmen. If you and your Infected friends really manage to take over the city, what will you do to the uninfected?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Massacre them all? Enslave them? Exile them to the wilderness and let them die of exposure?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or cut them all with Originium, turn them into Infected, spread your pain to them?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Or will you peacefully coexist with them?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Could you do that, Lyudmila? Could Reunion, as it is now, do that? Is that how you want to build your Infected nation? Or is that how you want to fight Ursus?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If the latter, why come to Lungmen? If you seek to terrify your enemies, what can you do to be more terrifying than Ursus?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Kal'tsit, she is confused. She is scared. She wants to run.)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Mon3tr, return.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is that okay?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: She can hear me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Crownslayer,' your hate as well as that of your movement has been used and abused, toyed with.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Think of your father. Remember what Ilia taught you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Think, on whom do you want revenge?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The one leading you down this path of terror and assassination... Your leader is not a sane person. Your leader has no heart.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A leader true to her ideals would not let someone else die for them, much less let someone commit murder on their behalf.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Run. Leave this place. Take a different path.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Take a path that can truly change this world... If that's what you want.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Her scent is gone.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Did you always want to see her? Why not kill her?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Should we kill a homeless hyena, even if the home isn't real?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A hard question. I don't know.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Projekt Red, do you think killing me would make her happy?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No. She is in pain.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: We are not the law. We cannot judge people. We have the power to kill others, but no power to claim it is right to do so.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If she took pleasure in the act of murder, I would have killed her on the spot. Without question.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know. She is not happy. Her breathing is erratic.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: She has now become a virus. A unique strain spreading 'unease' among the Infected fanatics of Chernobog.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...How many years does a person live? And how many paths can they take? We spend more time blind than we do seeing the truth.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But then, seeing the truth and making a choice are two different things.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When she awakens from this dream of collective revenge, she will leave Reunion. But even so, Sergei's blood, and that of the people of Chernobog, will always be on her hands.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Projekt Red... When you make a choice, there is no going back.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I understand. I will do my best. I will only kill wolves.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Good girl.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you remember that scent?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I remember.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: What is it like?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Not bad.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: It's a bloody smell, but not like you were just saying, with the heart and stuff.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: How silly. Talulah is a Draco, how could she be a wolf?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Time to go?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Yes, let's go.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...The temperature's dropping. We're running out of time. Let's step up our efficiency.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
